sentences.en: At Guinness, the sheer ambition of the project galvanized the teams.
sentences.cn: 在吉尼斯, 仅仅是野心的项目激发了队伍.
戴夫: 请帮我要一品脱的健力士.

sentences.en: Eastman and Guinness were at opposite extremes on the scale of disconfirmation.
sentences.cn: 伊斯曼与吉尼斯处于极端对立的规模整合.

sentences.en: Guinness first published its record book in 1955.
sentences.cn: 最早的《吉尼斯世界大全》于1955年出版.

sentences.en: Guinness Frotran function, a good books, direct the search query!
sentences.cn: Frotran函数大全, 很好的一本电子书, 可直接搜索查询!

sentences.en: He attempts to set a Guinness World Record.
sentences.cn: 他企图缔造一项金式世界纪录.

sentences.en: He must be in line for a place in the Guinness Book of Records.
sentences.cn: 他肯定能在《吉尼斯世界纪录大全》中获得一席之地。

sentences.en: I have to confess I acquired this belief from the book Guinness World Records.
sentences.cn: 我得说我是从《吉尼斯世界纪录》这本书里找到了这一信仰。

sentences.en: In this alcove were Gielgud, Alec Guinness and other distinguished actors.
sentences.cn: 当时里面坐着吉尔吉德 、 亚历克·吉尼斯等著名演员.

sentences.en: New 1 ton of Guinness notes, weight!
sentences.cn: 新吉尼斯纪录, 体重1吨!

sentences.en: Sir Hugh was the head of a brewing company called Guinness.
sentences.cn: 修爵士是金氏酿造公司的总裁.

sentences.en: The flag a Guinness record as being the world's largest.
sentences.cn: 它被吉尼斯世界纪录评为世界上最大的旗子.

sentences.en: They have been married for seven years, but it took the Hallquists until this year to contact Guinness World Records.
sentences.cn: 霍尔奎斯特夫妇已经结婚七年，但是直到今年他们才联系了吉尼斯世界纪录。

sentences.en: This bar has Guinness beer on draught.
sentences.cn: 这间酒吧有桶装的吉尼斯黑生啤.

sentences.en: Try some draught Guinness; it'll put hairs on your chest.
sentences.cn: 尝尝桶装的黑啤酒, 它会使你有男子汉的气魄的.

sentences.en: We set a Guinness World Record.
sentences.cn: 我们创造了一项吉尼斯世界记录!

trans.tran_cn: 英国产强性黑啤酒之一种，（商标名）
